title: Drafting Request Letters
original_prompt: Act as a professional writing coach. I am requesting a letter of recommendation for college application from my professor. Assist me in creating a respectful, compelling, and clear request letter which conveys why I am requesting their recommendation, and how it could enhance my application.
input1: Dear Professor Smith, I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to request a letter of recommendation for my college application to the University of XYZ. As you know, I have thoroughly enjoyed your Advanced Biology course and have learned so much under your guidance. Your insights into the subject have not only deepened my understanding but have also inspired me to pursue a career in environmental science. I believe that your perspective on my academic performance and my passion for the subject would greatly enhance my application. I would be incredibly grateful if you could support me in this endeavor. Thank you for considering my request.
input2: Dear Dr. Johnson, I hope you are doing well. I am writing to ask if you would be willing to provide a letter of recommendation for my application to the College of ABC. Having had the privilege of working with you on the research project last semester, I feel that you can speak to my dedication and skills in research methodology. Your endorsement would not only highlight my academic achievements but also my commitment to contributing to the field of psychology. I truly value your opinion and believe that your recommendation would significantly strengthen my application. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Subject: Request for Letter of Recommendation

Dear Professor Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to respectfully request a letter of recommendation from you for my college application to the University of XYZ. 

Having thoroughly enjoyed your Advanced Biology course, I have gained invaluable insights and knowledge that have significantly shaped my academic journey. Your teaching style and passion for the subject have not only deepened my understanding of biological concepts but have also inspired me to pursue a career in environmental science. I believe that your perspective on my academic performance, work ethic, and enthusiasm for the subject would provide a compelling endorsement of my application.

The University of XYZ is particularly appealing to me due to its strong emphasis on environmental studies and research opportunities. I am confident that your recommendation would highlight my dedication and readiness for the challenges of this program, making my application stand out.

If you agree to write this letter, I would be happy to provide any additional information you might need, such as my resume, personal statement, or details about the program. I understand that you have many commitments, and I truly appreciate your consideration of my request.

Thank you very much for your time and support. I look forward to hearing from you.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your Student ID (if applicable)]
